page.title: 09THE COMMUNE IN BURWELL.
page.content: The group live in buildings some of which are over 400 years old,like a listed{Tudor barn}they want restored. The house has 8 bedrooms. There are 6 adults and 2 children at present.Their lives are different from most peoples' in that{they grow {organically all their own vegetables {and fruit}like carrots,figs,grapes, tomatoes and{blackberries.They keep {goats and make hay}for animal bedding. Other animals include cats,a rabbit,2 budgies and lots of hens.They also have a chart to show whose turn it is to do the jobs such as putting the goats out and cooking the meal. They have an organisation called W.O.L.F. which enables people to stay for a weekend and help with the gardening. They are not fully independent being linked to the{Delta T Devices}firm.
